PRE_SCRIPT.PSCRI: :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.PREPARE_JOB :IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# <> "Standalone" OR "Managed Domain" : PRINT "&UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# must be either Standalone or Managed Domain" : EXIT 1 :ENDIF

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JBOSS_HOME# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_HOME# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.JBOSS_CLI@UNIX
! Validates application name, spaces should not be there :SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME#) :IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# = '' : PRINT Application name must not be empty. Aborting ... : EXIT 1 :ENDIF :SET &SPACE_CHECK# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME#, ' ') :IF &SPACE_CHECK# > 0 : PRINT Application name must not contain space. Aborting ... : EXIT 1 :ENDIF
!---------------------- Undeploy command ---------------------- :SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI_UNDEPLOY# = '&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --command="undeploy &UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME#'
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# = "Managed Domain" : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVER_GROUPS# = "" : SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI_UNDEPLOY# = '&UC4_JBOSS_CLI_UNDEPLOY# --all-relevant-server-groups' : ELSE : SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI_UNDEPLOY# = '&UC4_JBOSS_CLI_UNDEPLOY# --server-groups=&UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVER_GROUPS#' : ENDIF :ENDIF
:SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI_UNDEPLOY# = '&UC4_JBOSS_CLI_UNDEPLOY#"'
!----------------------
set NOPAUSE="True"
echo "Checking deployment information ..."
output=`&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --command="deployment-info --name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME#"` echo "$output" | grep -v "ARATools\|Version\:\|Date\:\|GmbH"
if [ "`echo "$output" | grep " not found"`" ]; then echo "&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# does not exist. Aborting ..." : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_FAIL_MISSING# = "YES" exit 1 : ELSE exit 0 : ENDIF fi
!---------- Deployment ------------ echo "Undeploying &UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# on JBoss EAP 6.1 (&UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE#) ..."
output=`&UC4_JBOSS_CLI_UNDEPLOY#` :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD_CUSTOM@UNIX
! Check if deploy already exist or not if [ "`echo "$output" | grep "Undeploy failed:"`" ]; then echo "Failed to undeploy &UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# on JBoss EAP 6 (&UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE#). Aborting ..." exit 1 fi
!---------------------------------
echo "Undeployment process finished. Checking for &UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# after deployment ..."
output=`&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --command="deployment-info --name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME#"`
echo "$output" | grep -v "ARATools\|Version\:\|Date\:\|GmbH"
! Return error if package not exist after undeployment if [ -z "`echo "$output" | grep " not found"`" ]; then echo "&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# still exists. Undeployment fails. Aborting ..." exit 1 else echo "&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# does not exist. Undeployment successfully." fi
